perturbation.original_text: "Lead-time" is defined as the amount of time between Manufacturer receiving an order and EMV receipt of the goods ordered. The ordering processes are listed in Section 4.
perturbation.changed_text: "Lead-time" is defined as the amount of time between Manufacturer receiving an order and EMV receipt of the goods ordered. The ordering processes are NOT listed in Section 4.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'Lead-time' and explicitly states that the ordering processes are listed in Section 4. By negating that the processes are not listed, this creates a direct contradiction and undermines the clarity of the definition, potentially leading to disputes about ordering procedure timing.

perturbation.original_text: Manufacturer shall include the information provided by EMV in the packaging in which the Products are sold and shall modify any of the packaging if requested by EMV.
perturbation.changed_text: Manufacturer shall include the information provided by EMV in the packaging in which the Products are sold and shall NOT modify any of the packaging even if requested by EMV.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows EMV to request changes to the packaging. By adding the stipulation that the manufacturer should not modify the package even if requested creates an in-text contradiction of terms. Undermining the agreement that EMV can request changes.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall have a term of four (4) years from the effective date first set forth above, and shall automatically renew for additional one year terms unless earlier terminated by either party.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall have a term of four (4) years from the effective date first set forth above, and shall NEVER renew for additional one year terms unless earlier terminated by either party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text indicates automatic renewal after the initial term, while the modified version states there will never be a renewal. This contradiction creates uncertainty about the duration of the agreement.
